thread.title: CLNS EQUITY ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Reminds Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Colony NorthStar, Inc.

author: cnbc.com
title: CLNS EQUITY ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Reminds Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Colony NorthStar, Inc.

organizations.name: board of directors of colony northstar, inc

text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether Colony NorthStar, Inc. (“Colony NorthStar” or the “Company”) (NYSE: CLNS) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/CLNS-Info-Request-Form-1880 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On March 1, 2018, shares of Colony NorthStar fell $1.78 per share to close at $6.00 per share after the Company reported disappointing financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2017. In a press release filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the Company announced “a $375 million write-down of goodwill and intangibles” related to the Company’s “retail investment management business.”
To learn more about the investigation of Colony NorthStar contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/CLNS-Info-Request-Form-1880 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180412005937/en/
The Law Offices of Vincent Wong
